encounters.description: A hidden spike trap with rust-covered blades

events: Turn 3: Player ssuing8825 moved north into position (2,1)

Turn 4: DM EVENT - ssuing8825 triggered a spike trap! The floor gave way beneath their feet, sending them plummeting onto a bed of wickedly sharp, rust-covered spikes. Blood pools beneath them as they struggle to pull themselves free, their screams echoing through the ancient dungeon. They've taken 8 points of grievous damage and are bleeding profusely (HP: 2/10).
dmNotes: Gruesome spike trap encounter - player barely survived. The rust on the spikes suggests potential infection if not treated. Blood trail will attract predators.
